\SetAPI{J}
\section{audit.active}
\label{configuration:AuditActive}
\ClearAPI
Defines if audit should be enabled or not. If true all beans required to record audit entries are registered, otherwise only mandatory configuration provider. Valid values are "true" and "false".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.config.AuditConfigurationConstants.AuditActive}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{audit.active}}]
audit.active=false
\end{lstlisting}
